metadata.name: instanceof_swf_6
metadata.description: Tests INSTANCEOF opcode (0x54) - ActionScript instanceof operator with full prototype chain traversal and interface checking support. Correctly handles primitives, objects, prototype chains, and interfaces.

implementation_notes:
The instanceof opcode is fully implemented with:
- Prototype chain traversal via __proto__ property
- Interface implementation checking (SWF 7+)
- Proper handling of primitives (always return false)
- Null/undefined constructor handling
- Loop protection for circular prototype chains

Comprehensive testing with built-in types (Object, Array, etc.) would require runtime initialization of built-in prototypes (Object.prototype, Array.prototype), which is a separate infrastructure concern.
